Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10™ Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for illumigene® Mycoplasma DNA Amplification Assay, a qualitative isothermal amplification test for Mycoplasma pneumoniae DNA in throat and nasopharyngeal swabs using the illumipro-10™ system.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection of Mycoplasma pneumoniae DNA in human throat and nasopharyngeal swabs from patients suspected of Mycoplasma pneumoniae infection; for use with the illumipro-10 system and intended for point-of-care use.
